page.title: 01GOLLANFIELD AREA
page.content: {Gollanfield}area is mainly farm- land.A railway runs through it and so does an important road.The road{(A96) links{Inverness}and{Nairn. There are two Lochs,{Loch {Flemington}and the{Loch of the Clans} where many birds nest such as{Herons {Ducks}and even the{Osprey}.Beside the Loch of the Clans,lie the{Kames,}which are thought to have been formed in the {Ice Age}.There are some remains of a lake village {(Crannog)}.There are no rivers,just some streams . We are near {Dalcross }airport which is very intresting and convenient if you wish to {travel}.The nearest town is {Ardersier }which is two kilometres away. There are some {Tourist } attractions including a {Pottery } where you can see a potter at work.
